settings.title: Settings
settings.descObservability: AI tracing, metrics, and cost analysis
settings.descAgentOptimization: Claude best practices for agent systems
settings.descAgentTrace: View AI attribution traces for generated files and artifacts
settings.descExternalAgents: Configure external AI agents like Claude Code
settings.descSync: Sync data via WebDAV or GitHub
settings.descLogs: View, search, and export application logs
settings.descLoggingConfig: Configure log levels, transports, and retention policies
settings.resetDialogDescription: This will reset all settings to their default values. Your API keys and chat history will be preserved.
settings.customModesDesc: Create and manage custom agent modes with specific tools, prompts, and behaviors

agentTrace.title: Agent Trace
agentTrace.description: Browse AI attribution traces recorded during tool execution.
agentTrace.filtersDescription: Filter traces by session, file path, VCS revision, or event type.
agentTrace.emptyDescription: Run an agent session that writes files or creates artifacts to generate traces.
agentTrace.detailsHint: This is the raw Agent Trace record stored locally.

recording.title: Agent Trace Recording
recording.description: Control whether agent actions are traced and stored locally.

dialogs.clearAllDescription: This will permanently delete all agent trace records. This action cannot be undone.
dialogs.deleteDescription: This will permanently delete this agent trace record.

config.title: Recording Options
config.description: Configure what gets traced and retention settings.
config.maxRecordsDescription: Maximum number of trace records to keep (0 = unlimited)
config.autoCleanupDescription: Automatically delete traces older than specified days (0 = never)
config.traceShellCommandsDescription: Include shell command executions in traces
config.traceCodeEditsDescription: Include code edit operations in traces
config.traceFailedCallsDescription: Include failed tool calls in traces (useful for debugging)

sessionSummary.title: Session Analytics
sessionSummary.description: Select a session to view aggregated analytics including token usage, latency, and tool success rates.

checkpoints.title: Checkpoints
checkpoints.noSession: Select a session to view checkpoints
checkpoints.clearConfirmDescription: This will permanently delete all checkpoints for this session. This action cannot be undone.

installation.title: Git Installation
installation.description: Distributed version control system for tracking changes
installation.installPrompt: Git is required for version control features. Install it to enable project versioning.

autoCommit.title: Auto-Commit Settings
autoCommit.description: Configure automatic commits for your projects
autoCommit.enableDescription: Automatically commit changes based on triggers

searchSettings.title: Web Search
searchSettings.description: Configure multi-provider web search for research capabilities
searchSettings.enableSearchDescription: Allow AI to search the web for current information
searchSettings.maxResultsDescription: Number of search results to return
searchSettings.providersDescription: Configure API keys for different search providers
searchSettings.fallbackDescription: Automatically try next provider if primary fails
searchSettings.configureProviderHint: Configure at least one search provider below
searchSettings.researchSourcesDesc: Default sources for deep research mode

dataSettings.title: Data Management
dataSettings.storageDesc: Data stored locally in your browser
dataSettings.exportDescription: Download all your data as a JSON file
dataSettings.importDescription: Restore data from a previously exported file
dataSettings.dataPrivacyDesc: Exports contain chat history, settings, and API keys. Keep secure.
dataSettings.deleteConfirmDesc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete all your chat sessions, artifacts, settings, and stored API keys.
dataSettings.clearDescription: Permanently delete all sessions and data
dataSettings.clearConfirm: Are you sure? This action cannot be undone.
dataSettings.privacyConsentDesc: Manage privacy consents and optimization data
dataSettings.privacyConsentReset: Privacy consent and optimization history cleared
dataSettings.resetMcpConsentDesc: Clear your MCP prompt optimization privacy consent and optimization history. You will be asked to confirm privacy again when using MCP mode.
dataSettings.helpAndTourDesc: Restart the guided tour to learn about features
dataSettings.storageCleanupDesc: Free up space by removing unnecessary data
dataSettings.quickCleanupDesc: Remove temporary files and cache data
dataSettings.deepCleanupDesc: Remove all non-essential data for maximum space savings
dataSettings.deepCleanupWarning: This will remove all cached data and may affect performance temporarily
dataSettings.storageHealthy: Your storage is in good condition

themeEditor.title: Theme Editor
themeEditor.createThemeDescription: Create a custom color theme for your interface.
themeEditor.darkThemeDescription: Create a dark variant of this theme
themeEditor.previewSubtitle: This is how your theme will look
themeEditor.previewContent: Sample content to preview your theme colors.
themeEditor.importExportDescription: Share your custom themes or import from a file
themeEditor.exportThemesDesc: Export all your custom themes ({count}) to a JSON file
themeEditor.importThemesDesc: Import custom themes from a JSON file
themeEditor.nameTooLong: Name must be {max} characters or less
themeEditor.nameDuplicate: A theme with this name already exists

customThemeEditor.description: Customize syntax highlighting colors for code blocks in exports

tooltips.latex: Render LaTeX math formulas in responses

keyboardSettings.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
keyboardSettings.description: Customize shortcuts to match your workflow
keyboardSettings.customShortcutsAlert: You have {count} custom shortcut(s) configured. Custom shortcuts are highlighted with a colored border.
keyboardSettings.allShortcutsDesc: Click the edit button to customize any shortcut
keyboardSettings.tip1: Press / anywhere to focus the chat input
keyboardSettings.tip2: Use Ctrl+K to open the command palette
keyboardSettings.tip3: Press Esc to stop AI generation
keyboardSettings.resetConfirmDesc: This will restore all keyboard shortcuts to their default values. Your custom shortcuts will be removed.
keyboardSettings.editShortcutDesc: Press the key combination you want to use for "{action}"
keyboardSettings.pressAnotherCombination: Press another combination to change, or click Save
keyboardSettings.editTip: Tip: Click edit, then press the new key combination

keyboardShortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
keyboardShortcuts.description: Use these shortcuts to navigate and work faster.
keyboardShortcuts.commandPaletteHint: to open the command palette for quick actions.

speechSettings.sttDescription: Configure voice input settings for dictation
speechSettings.systemSpeechDesc: Uses browser's built-in speech recognition. Fast and free, but accuracy varies by browser.
speechSettings.whisperDesc: Uses OpenAI Whisper API for high-accuracy transcription. Requires API key.
speechSettings.continuousModeDesc: Keep listening after each phrase (vs stopping after silence)
speechSettings.autoSendDesc: Automatically send message after voice input stops
speechSettings.autoStopSilenceDesc: Automatically stop listening after a period of silence
speechSettings.ttsDescription: Configure voice output settings for AI responses
speechSettings.enableTtsDesc: Allow AI responses to be read aloud
speechSettings.systemTtsDesc: Uses browser's built-in speech synthesis. Free and fast.
speechSettings.openaiTtsDesc: High-quality neural voices from OpenAI. Requires API key.
speechSettings.geminiTtsDesc: Native text-to-speech from Google Gemini 2.5. Requires API key.
speechSettings.edgeTtsDesc: Microsoft Edge neural voices. Free and high quality.
speechSettings.browserSupportNote: Speech features depend on browser support. Chrome and Edge have the best support for speech recognition.

appearanceSettings.previewTextDesc: This is how text will appear.
appearanceSettings.launchAtStartupDesc: Automatically start app on system boot

themeScheduleSettings.title: Theme Schedule
themeScheduleSettings.description: Automatically switch between light and dark mode
themeScheduleSettings.enableScheduleDesc: Automatically switch theme based on time
themeScheduleSettings.systemThemeNote: Note: Schedule will not apply when theme is set to "System"
themeScheduleSettings.overrideSystemDesc: Allow schedule to override system theme preference

settingsProfilesSettings.title: Appearance Profiles
settingsProfilesSettings.description: Save and load different appearance configurations
settingsProfilesSettings.newProfileDesc: Save current appearance settings as a new profile

uiCustomizationSettings.title: UI Customization
uiCustomizationSettings.description: Customize the look and feel of the interface
uiCustomizationSettings.enableBlurDesc: Enable backdrop blur effects (may affect performance)
uiCustomizationSettings.uiFontFamilyDesc: Select the font used throughout the interface

backgroundSettings.title: Background Image
backgroundSettings.supportedFormats: Supports PNG, JPG, WebP, GIF, SVG formats

backgroundImportExport.dialogDescription: Share your background settings or import from a file
backgroundImportExport.exportSettingsDesc: Export current background settings to a JSON file
backgroundImportExport.importSettingsDesc: Import background settings from a JSON file
backgroundImportExport.localFilesNote: Note: Locally uploaded images are not included in exports. Only URL and preset backgrounds are exported.

autoRouterSettings.title: Auto Model Routing
autoRouterSettings.description: Automatically select the best model based on task complexity
autoRouterSettings.autoModelRoutingDesc: Automatically select the best model based on task complexity
autoRouterSettings.modeRuleBasedDesc: Fast pattern matching, no API calls
autoRouterSettings.modeLlmBasedDesc: More accurate, uses small model for classification
autoRouterSettings.modeHybridDesc: Rule-based with LLM fallback for complex queries
autoRouterSettings.strategyQualityDesc: Always use the best available model
autoRouterSettings.strategyBalancedDesc: Balance between quality, cost, and speed
autoRouterSettings.fallbackTierDesc: Model tier to use when no suitable model is found
autoRouterSettings.showRoutingIndicatorDesc: Display routing decisions in the chat interface
autoRouterSettings.allowManualOverrideDesc: Let users override automatic model selection
autoRouterSettings.enableRoutingCacheDesc: Cache routing decisions for faster responses

safetySettings.title: Safety Mode
safetySettings.description: Enable security checks to filter dangerous content and prevent prompt injection attacks
safetySettings.detectionModeDesc: Choose how to handle detected threats
safetySettings.customPatternsDesc: Add custom patterns to block or allow specific content
safetySettings.safetyRulesDesc: Manage custom safety rules for content filtering
safetySettings.externalReviewApiDesc: Integrate with external content moderation services for enhanced safety checks

customModeSettings.deleteConfirmDesc: Are you sure you want to delete this mode? This action cannot be undone.

simplifiedMode.title: Simplified Mode
simplifiedMode.shortcutHint: Press this shortcut to toggle simplified mode

chatSettings.defaultProviderDesc: The default AI provider used for new conversations
chatSettings.configureProviderHint: Configure at least one provider in Provider settings
chatSettings.streamResponsesDesc: Show AI response as it generates
chatSettings.generationParamsDesc: Core settings for AI response generation
chatSettings.tokenHint: Actual usage depends on message content

tooltips.temperature: Controls randomness. Lower = more focused, higher = more creative
tooltips.maxTokens: Maximum length of AI response in tokens (~4 chars per token)
tooltips.topP: Nucleus sampling - consider only tokens with cumulative probability up to this value
tooltips.frequencyPenalty: Reduces repetition of frequently used words
tooltips.presencePenalty: Encourages the model to talk about new topics
tooltips.contextMessages: Number of previous messages included in context

strategyDesc.summary: Summarize older messages to save tokens

tooltips.preserveRecent: Number of recent messages always kept uncompressed

historyContext.title: Chat History Context
historyContext.description: Include compressed context from recent conversations when starting new chats
historyContext.enableDesc: Automatically inject recent chat summaries into new conversations

tooltips.tokenBudget: Maximum tokens to use for history context
tooltips.minMessages: Minimum messages required to include a session

tokenizerSettings.title: Token Counting
tokenizerSettings.description: Configure how tokens are counted for different AI models.
tokenizerSettings.enablePreciseCountingDesc: Use official tokenizers for accurate token counts
tokenizerSettings.enablePreciseCountingTooltip: Uses official tokenizers for accurate counts. May use remote APIs.
tokenizerSettings.preferredTokenizerTooltip: Select which tokenizer to use. Auto-detect chooses based on the model.

provider.autoDesc: Automatically select tokenizer based on model
provider.tiktokenDesc: Local tokenizer for GPT models - fast and accurate
provider.geminiDesc: Google's official token counter - requires API key
provider.claudeDesc: Anthropic's official token counter - requires API key
provider.glmDesc: Zhipu's official token counter - requires API key
provider.estimationDesc: Fast local estimation - approximate but always available

tokenizerSettings.autoDetectByModelDesc: Automatically select the best tokenizer for each model
tokenizerSettings.enableCachingDesc: Cache token counts to reduce API calls
tokenizerSettings.fallbackToEstimationDesc: Use estimation if precise counting fails
tokenizerSettings.showTokenBreakdownDesc: Display detailed token counts per message
tokenizerSettings.contextLimitWarningDesc: Show warning when approaching context limit

toolSettings.title: Built-in Tools
toolSettings.permissionsDesc: Tools marked with a warning icon require your approval before executing. This helps prevent unintended actions.
toolSettings.desktopRequiredDesc: File operations require the desktop app. Some features may be limited in the web version.
toolSettings.fileOperationsDesc: Read, write, copy, move, and search files on your local system
toolSettings.documentProcessingDesc: Analyze, summarize, and chunk documents for processing
toolSettings.webSearchDesc: Search the internet for current information
toolSettings.knowledgeBaseDesc: Search your uploaded documents using semantic similarity
toolSettings.calculatorDesc: Perform mathematical calculations and unit conversions
toolSettings.codeExecutionDesc: Execute JavaScript code in a sandboxed environment

welcomeSettings.title: Welcome Page
welcomeSettings.description: Customize the welcome page appearance and content
welcomeSettings.enabledDescription: Show welcome page when starting a new chat
welcomeSettings.customGreetingHint: Leave empty to use the default mode-specific greeting
welcomeSettings.sectionVisibilityDescription: Choose which sections to display on the welcome page
welcomeSettings.customSuggestionsDescription: Add custom prompt suggestions for each mode
welcomeSettings.noCustomSuggestions: No custom suggestions for this mode
welcomeSettings.quickAccessLinksDescription: Configure shortcut links shown on the welcome page
welcomeSettings.useCustomQuickAccessHint: Replace default Designer and Projects links with custom ones
welcomeSettings.userNameHint: Used for personalized greetings (e.g., 'Good morning, John'). Supports {name} placeholder in custom greeting.
welcomeSettings.timeBasedGreetingDescription: Show different greetings based on time of day (Good morning/afternoon/evening)
welcomeSettings.timeGreetingHint: Leave empty to use default locale-aware greeting
welcomeSettings.layoutStyleDescription: Choose the visual layout for the welcome page
welcomeSettings.iconConfigDescription: Customize the icon displayed in the welcome header
welcomeSettings.gradientConfigDescription: Customize the welcome header background gradient
welcomeSettings.customGradientHint: Tailwind gradient classes for the header background
welcomeSettings.simplifiedSuggestionsDescription: Custom suggestion prompts shown in simplified (focused/zen) mode
welcomeSettings.simplifiedSuggestionsHint: One suggestion per line (max 4 per mode)
welcomeSettings.simplifiedSuggestionsPlaceholder: Enter suggestion prompts, one per line...

shortcutConflict.title: Shortcut Conflicts Detected
shortcutConflict.singleDescription: The following shortcut conflict needs to be resolved:
shortcutConflict.multipleDescription: {count} shortcut conflicts need to be resolved:
shortcutConflict.keepExistingTooltip: Keep the currently assigned shortcut and discard the new one
shortcutConflict.useNewTooltip: Replace the existing shortcut with the new assignment

shortcutManager.title: Shortcut Manager
shortcutManager.description: View and manage all keyboard shortcuts
shortcutManager.resolutionWarnTooltip: Show a warning when conflicts are detected
shortcutManager.resolutionBlockTooltip: Block shortcut registration when conflicts exist
shortcutManager.resolutionAutoResolveTooltip: Automatically resolve conflicts using the latest shortcut
